Html:
I am working on automating a section of our internal website so that when someone uploads an excel 2003 (Excel5) document, it will automatically be converted to a tab delimited csv file. I have succeeded in doing this using PHPExcel, however it puts double quotes "" around everything. Is there a way to save to a tab delimited csv file without double quotes around every "cell"? Thank you. Details are listed below:

System: WampServer 2.1 on Windows Server 2008 Enterprise
PHP: 5.3.4
PHPExcel: 1.7.8

You'd have to modify the CSV writer to give you what you needed; but it shouldn't matter to any program that can read CSV files - inasmuch as there is a standard, quotes are optional unless explicitly required (because the data contains the delimiter) but any reader that adheres to the standard shouldn't complain
